lines.text: I shall never forget, there were twenty four curtain calls.
Twenty two curtain calls, you said last time.
Later, Mr Gould came back to my dressing room...

...and asked me to give a private performance of Hamlet at his estate. 'No, Mr Astor' I said. 'My art is for the world to see not for the few. I am not in the roll of the common men' - Henry IV Act 3 Scene I.
It was then that I decided to sacrifice my personal interest and bring great theater to this western wilderness
[the coach goes over a bump, Tracy bangs his head]
Sorry Mr Holland, we're in a rut.
Now let me see, where was I? Oh, yes. I must bestride the narrow world like a colossus - Julius Caesar Act I Scene 2.
I've got news for you. It never happened.
Madame, you dare to doubt my word? I who have played before the crowned heads of Europe? You attack my veracity?
Well, that's one way of putting it.
Blow, blow thou winter wind, thou art not so unkind as woman's ingratitude!
